text: Some days I feel like *whenever one of the people who wrote the spec for CSS grid, hears someone talking about layout*, they must break out in “hahah okay okay I see what’s happening here… your face to face with greatness and it’s strange” :musical_note:  *“What can I say, except you’re welcome!“*
for real though. love grid so much
I am afraid of it. Used to love it but ie burned me
